sentences: Ma olen pidanud seda ülesannet väga oluliseks.
Ta on pidanud mitmeid loenguid selle teema peale.
Nad on pidanud kõnelusi võimaliku koostöö üle.
context: The word 'pidanud' is the past participle form of the Estonian verb 'pidama', which means to hold or to keep. It is commonly used in sentences to describe an action that has been done or an event that has taken place.
